item.title: MongoDB, Node.js and You
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Node.js, MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, how does this all tie together? Mitch walks you through the creation of an example app to demonstrate how to take advantage of Node.js and MongoDB, while leveraging features from AngularJS and Express for rapid prototyping that can survive a production launch.
item.content:encoded: Node.js, MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, how does this all tie together? Mitch walks you through the creation of an example app to demonstrate how to take advantage of Node.js and MongoDB, while leveraging features from AngularJS and Express for rapid prototyping that can survive a production launch.
